Title: toIntervalMinute
Description: Returns an interval of n minutes of data type IntervalMinute.
n — Number of minutes. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalMinute(12) AS interval_to_minutesSELECT date + interval_to_minutes AS result
